website_summaries.verdict: If your cat has food allergies, a frequently upset tummy, or poor skin and fur, do them a favor by mixing a scoop of Total-Biotics into their meal once a day, and chances are good that you’ll see an improvement before long.
pros: Easily absorbed into your cat’s digestive system
cons: It’s easy to lose the tiny plastic scoop included with each tub in the probiotics powder between meals

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a yeast infection of the feet, ear. Researched on line what to do about it and this Total Biotics came highly recommended. She was bitting her paws and scratching her ears so much she was making sores on them. I have had her on it for 5 days and I can't believe how fast it brought her relief. Very good product. Will make sure I have this during the spring thru fall to make sure she doesn't get this again. Keeps her digestive system good as she was eating grass and vomiting more than I thought she should (though she would eat anything and everything), I noticed she isn't doing that either. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Spring

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have fixed our dog's chronic itchiness.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog had a terrible itching problem for almost a year. We tried everything -- radical diet change, 5 different kinds of antihistamines, multiple visits to the vet, anti-itch shampoos, etc. Nothing seemed to work. But we now credit regular use of this probiotic powder for the relief our dog has finally found. It won't work for every dog with chronic itchiness, but it seems to have worked a miracle in our case. I would have been naturally skeptical about this, but we were really out of options. Glad we tried it.
customer_reviews.author: A's Fan

customer_reviews.title: like people, get older
customer_reviews.text: My Jack Russell is almost 14 years old and has been on this and the Total-Zymes since he was about 1 year old. He has never had any digestive or other major health issues and is still going strong. I have no proof that these products helped, but I'm not going to stop giving them to him. As dogs, like people, get older, there digestive system produces fewer enzymes to break down the food, which can cause an imbalance in the intestinal flora.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morales

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m happy thus far. I’m not happy the container is only 1/3 full. Another item, enzymes from another company, comes full. I have 4 animals who could use this, however, it would only last a week. So I use it only with my dog who has yeasty ears. Will buy another brand. I like this that it is natural, I need more product not a container
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this product once and was very happy with it. Ordered it a second time and noticed that the new container had black specks in it. Used the product for about two weeks then our dog began to vomit. Stopped the product and the vomiting stopped. Waited for about three weeks then began giving the product again. The vomiting began again. Don't endanger the health of your pet or waste your money. Their quality control obviously is substandard.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I've tried so many things to help my dogs pain. I've been using this for a year now My dog is 18 and has a lot of issues being so elderly. This keeps him regular and it seems to add some pain relief and give him some energy. Also a sidenote (I'm not a veterinarian) I also use this for my pet rats in their yogurt once a week. At a smaller dosage of course. Love this product and can't say enough good about it. Wish it was a little less expensive but for the health of my dog it's worth it. Also it lasts quite a while with him. Though he is 11 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Hackbarth

customer_reviews.title: I'm having very good, ongoing success with this product as a probiotic ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm having very good, ongoing success with this product as a probiotic for my four Australian Shepherds. It does a good job of maintaining good digestive health--none of them have had problems with loose stools since they have been using it--which is for close to a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: My adopted shelter pup was having major digestive problems. Our vet took x-rays and everything was fine. She prescribed a probiotic which helped some but not totally. He would still throw up with no advance warning. I ordered Total-Biotics and it has been great. No more problems. I love this product because you only use a tiny bit daily so a little goes a long way. Will continue to use as long as needed.
customer_reviews.author: OPA

customer_reviews.title: This Is Worth A Try
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped my 12 yr. old Rat Terrier who has very bad hip arthritis. It has made a definite improvement in her energy and flexibility. Not a miracle cure but it really helps my pup. I have tried several supplements like this and with some my dog would back away from the bowl. This brand you sprinkle one small scoop and my dog has no issues with it being in her food.
customer_reviews.author: R.Kimmel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Probiotic for your pooch
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff for our dogs. We also use the prebiotic. One of our dogs is a rescue and his fur was not shiny nor soft when he arrived and he had a ton of allergy type symptoms. After having him on this for several months his fur is very soft and shiny now and he doesn't smell as much like a frito! It is pricey, but it lasts a long time and we use it for 2 dogs.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: !!!!Great stuff!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff and helps my lab with his stools to help his anal gland problem. I also give firm up! Pumpkin bulk supplement, sold on Amazon, and they no longer have problems. Update: I have tried a couple other brands of probiotics and they didn't work the way these did. I even tried giving my dog GLANDEX which had really good reviews to help with his anal gland problems. It didn't work. At all. Bought this brand again and it is literally a miracle. Its high quality stuff. This made his stools go from soft and sometimes runny and thin to bulky and healthy within a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: ash

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to purchase this product
customer_reviews.text: I first heard about this specific product thru the rescue organization I volunteer with. I got this for the benefits of a probiotic for my 2 small dogs. There's been a noticeable change for the better in the firmness of their stool. I'll continue to use this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for my dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Since this is for my dogs I have not tasted it and I don’t mix it with water. They don’t seem to mind it being sprinkled directly on their food. I’ve been using this product for 5 years. It seems to be helping them stay off antibiotics from eating whatever dogs eat outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs that I used this product with. One being a 12 year old American Cocker Spaniel in excellent health and a 5 year old Queensland mix with digestive issues periodically. I found this product to be easy to use and felt there was an improvement in their skin, coat, stool consistency and overall health. It was supposed to come with a measuring spoon but it did not. We made do anyway so not really a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: but my cat had horrible stinky runny poops and non stop gas
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked that this worked. Not to sound yucky, but my cat had horrible stinky runny poops and non stop gas. I use premium food and she is an inside cat so I know she doesn't eat anything else. After using this for 8 days, yes, only 8 days, (one scoop per day) I have to actually check the litter box to see if there is anything in there. This morning she didn't even bury her "business" and I couldn't smell a thing. I will never be without this product. Maybe I should give some to my husband, lol.
customer_reviews.author: workingforaliving

customer_reviews.title: ... combo enzymes and probiotics from this company and was pretty happy with it until this last order
customer_reviews.text: I have placed several orders of the combo enzymes and probiotics from this company and was pretty happy with it until this last order. The exzymes became chunky and I wasnʻt able to use the entire bottle. I had the lid screwed on tightly but am not sure why this happened.
customer_reviews.author: TSM

customer_reviews.title: Great value product
customer_reviews.text: Our fur baby has allergies, she’s been on this for 3 years now to help build her immune system. Because the servings last a year, we keep it in the refrigerator, mix it with her dinner each evening. A great value product.
customer_reviews.author: Holly S

customer_reviews.title: Not for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to rate this product. Not sure if it did what it's supposed to. Made my dog vomit even when I used about 1/4-1/3 of a recommended serving. I returned it. There was no issue with the return, the rating is about the product not the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Brubaker

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful to find an affordable probiotic for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: It's wonderful to find an affordable probiotic for my dogs. They're rat terrier-chihuahua mixed and they have skin problems. This seems to help with that. It really is odor less. They don't even know it's there in their food bowl!! It also comes with its own scoop. :)
customer_reviews.author: April Thomas

customer_reviews.title: eliminated horrible doggie gas!
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use with a few teaspoons of water mixed into dry food. works great on my dogs sensitive stomach issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tari Zimmaro

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my pet
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this products works well, but I think my dog is sensitive to it. After day two of adding it to his meal he started throwing up. I missed the window of return so if the product don’t work be quick to return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog eats it right up
customer_reviews.text: We had months of trouble after we adopted our adult shelter dog: endless diarrhea and vomiting. He actually stopped eating for a while. We finally got him stablized on a grain-free diet with expensive allergen-free dog food. We also add this probiotic to his food. He's doing great now. His EXTREMELY sensitive digestion is now well-supported by by Total-biotics powder. And he eats it with no problem. We sprinkle it on top of every meal and he chomps it down. We are very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Rodriguez-Martin

customer_reviews.title: ENZYMES FOR DOGS FOOD
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to help my dogs with their digestive system...definitely has made a difference since they were diagnosed with a sensitive stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn-DogLoverLV

customer_reviews.title: Put my Bull Terrier on this when she was about ...
customer_reviews.text: Put my Bull Terrier on this when she was about 6 months old because she was getting frequent diarrhea. She is 4 years old now. She never has diarrhea anymore. I think this helps.
customer_reviews.author: MJF

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the correct scoop size!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and have ordered it a couple times but this time, inside the container, instead of a 1/4 of a teaspoon scoop there was a giant, multi-tablespoon scoop inside!! I had sent this to my Mom to give to her dog so she didn’t realize the scoop was the wrong size and gave it to her dog for several days before I saw the scoop! Fortunately her dog was ok despite being majorly overdosed with this. I’m very disappointed by their quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Carney

customer_reviews.title: Seems like good product
customer_reviews.text: I got this Bc my vet said there was extra bacteria in both my dogs stools. I assume it is because they are on a raw diet but didn’t want it to be a problem. This blends in well with food, they don’t seem to mind. Haven’t been back to vet yet
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Adams

customer_reviews.title: good supplements
customer_reviews.text: This product has a wide range of probiotics, and I sprinkle it on dog food. Keep it in the freezer so that it lasts longer. Better than the probiotics baked into dog food.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Total-Probiotics
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product over others because of the variety of pro-biotics included. My dog was recovering slowly from surgery but had a diarrhea problem from the antibiotics that wouldn't go away. I tried all the home remedies, rice and hamburger, yogurt, etc and in desperation bought this. It took only one day for my dog to get back to normal after all that time and I use the product to this day. It has a nice sweet flavor that my dog likes, unlike some reviews that talk about the objectionable flavor of their product. You won't be disappointed. I keep mine in the refrigerator to extend the life of the pro-biotics.
customer_reviews.author: L. Noble

customer_reviews.title: Good for the doggy gutt
customer_reviews.text: My Boxer had IBD and was suffering terribly. This and (of course) changing his diet was one of the key things that nursed him back to health. We tried several others but always returned right back to this one. His stomach would start gurgling only days after stopping this.
customer_reviews.author: RainMan

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this product to my dog for eight years. He has trouble with bowel movements and this enzyme/probiotic helps him be regular. Of course, being a probiotic, it also greatly enhances his immune system; as it does in people. He has never been sick.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be making a difference with our fur ...
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be making a difference with our fur babies allergies & he does not seem to notice a difference with the powder in his food
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this some time back now and still have plenty. One of my dogs has an allergy of some sort and it was suggested to put her on a pro-biotic. It's only been about a month (and if it is yeast related) it isn't expected to see results for six or so. Anyway, I have noticed her coat is much much softer. I put my other two dogs on this same regimen as preventative - not sure what to expect really. No troubles though.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: It works really good on my dog
customer_reviews.text: It works really good on my dog, had loose stools now its really much better Has 14 probiotcs and its powder so easy to put in the food

customer_reviews.title: Its been a great product for my dog
customer_reviews.text: This contiues to be a top notch product I give to my dog every morning, 3rd year of use. I particularly appreciate that it is sealed inside. Be sure to check the expiration date to be sure you have almost a year to use the product.

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic
customer_reviews.text: My dog was having digestion problems and this cured it.
customer_reviews.author: Pokerlvr715

customer_reviews.title: This is a miracle in a jar!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat who is prone to UTIs. I have another one who has food allergies. I read info about this product before I ordered it and I am so glad that I did! My cats are so much different. They are even softer. I recommended this to a friend and I am sure she will love it too! I will be ordering this again in the future so I will never be without. Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: ms_kitty4

customer_reviews.title: Recommended !
customer_reviews.text: Not as concentrated as some and recommended to keep in the fridge; but does the job just as well as the pricey stuff for our sick pooch.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Helps with gas issues!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not quite sure what exact results I was expecting from this product, but I have been very happy with it. I own Rhodesian Ridgebacks and I think they pass the most gas of any dog I have known :) I have tried multiple things to alleviate this issue but to no avail (grain free foods, probiotic pills, yogurt, etc). When I adopted my last dog, the rescue recommended this product to me. I cannot believe how well it works! I am no longer embarrassed by the dogs, or have to explain the smell, when my friends come over. My dogs look and feel very healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on a Tuesday and received it 2 or 3 days later - super speedy! I've had my cat for 7 years and she's always had a problem with diarrhea. After her 2nd UTI (and 2nd round of antibiotics) in 4 months, I decided to research probiotics for cats to replace all the bacteria that the antibiotics have destroyed. After 2 weeks on these probiotics, her bathroom time has greatly improved (i.e., more solid and less diarrhea!). I just sprinkle half a scoop on half a cup of her dry food and she eats it with no problem (she's very picky). I am very pleased with the outcome and will definitely be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen W.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for over a year now. We use one scoop per meal for our Irish Retriever that is 50lbs. and eats 1.5 Cups of food per meal. One container lasts us 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Aren Clark

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: All the furbabies seem to do well with it and don't mind having it added to their food
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Additive for raw fed diet
customer_reviews.text: Working well for my dog, who was just started on raw fed diet, beginning of June. This gives her the necessary probiotics for her gut health, in dealing with the new raw diet.
customer_reviews.author: K9Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have a boxer with stomach problems not sure what is going on exactly. She has been to vet many times they say could have to do with pancreas. This product has done a great job of keeping her poo regulated. I give her on scoop in morning only and even sometimes every other day.

customer_reviews.title: I used the enzymes with the probiotics. Comments made ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the enzymes with the probiotics. Comments made to enzymes. Did see a difference in dogs extras. But I've pulled back on using it because my dog refuses to eat anything with it. I've even tried blending it in food....to no avail. I noticed her extras got significantly smaller after not using the powders.

customer_reviews.title: Used this for 4 years

customer_reviews.title: Probiotics for my shelter kitty
customer_reviews.text: No more huge vet bills! My shelter kitty had some issues when I first brought her home and the vet bills were adding up with tests and meds... I now feed her a raw diet and add this in her breakfast... her PH levels are normal, she is fine and fit and no more expensive trips to the vet! Her last checkup she was pronounced in great shape!

customer_reviews.title: Good to go!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old Australian Shepard developed a hot spot at an old IV site used for anesthesia. After dealing with the hot spot for more than a year the vet prescribed a long term course of an antibiotic. I bought this to maintain good digestion. Even though there was a strong chemical odor present her stool consistency was normal during the treatment. Recommended.

Previously I've used a combination of Total-Biotics and Total-Zymes, but currently I'm using the probiotics only with good results. Less gas, less stink-butt, better poops.

customer_reviews.text: Works well for keeping the boys regular and comfortable. Started using it for an older dog with recurring issues, never had problems again.

customer_reviews.text: I have two a recessive color gene (Fawn) Doberman Pinchers, this product helps with my dogs skin issues. I simply mix it into some Strawberry flavored Greek Yogurt and they gobble it up!

Fairly prompt delivery; only wish there was another choice than the USPS (only b/c my mailman usually throws my deliveries onto my porch). Price is, IMO, a bit high, but one must pay for quality.

I don't even give him an entire dose and we have seen such a huge improvement. A grain free meat based food, some pumpkin and this product daily have been a life saver!!

It has worked to eliminate all sores, most pain and allowed our senior dog to have seriously good quality of life, once again.

customer_reviews.text: Not really any noticeable differences in my dog's digestion. Seems to be helping with her white fur turning brown from licking.

customer_reviews.title: Stops runny stool
customer_reviews.text: Our GSD was having issues. Once we started added the supplement to his meals, he became very regular. We are both happy campers.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats and dogs
customer_reviews.text: Cured my kittens bad breath in just a few days.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product. I give it with each meal to help my dogs digestive track. Dog has been fine since I started this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Too early to tell
customer_reviews.text: Bought because I read it would improve dogs immune response to allergens. I can't say I've noticed a difference in his scratching and biting, but allergies are so complicated to determine what the allergen is that I am going to continue. It's been about 6 weeks, so I think too early to tell. He does not have as much gas, which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Baltazar

customer_reviews.title: This is not for cats
customer_reviews.text: I won't give this one star because I'm sure it may work well for dogs. I tried this. Didn't do anything. As I became more aware of my cat's needs, I appreciated that the gut fauna of a cat is much different than of a dog. So, this product may be beneficial to dogs but it places unnatural bacteria into the digestive tract of a cat. Cats are not omnivores. Do yourself a favor and buy Purina's Fortiflora for cats. I don't like supporting big industrial pet food companies but that product is designed specifically for cats with a fauna for cats. A product designed for cats and dogs is not the answer.
customer_reviews.author: The Chef

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I had a female Lab with a sensitive digestive system. Numerous vet visits to have bloody and mucous stools checked. Nothing was ever found. I finally started her on Total Biotics and pumpkin and she cleared up. Stools are now normal and have been for the last 2 years. I keep Total Biotics refrigerated. I give it to both my dogs, and they lap it right up. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah I. Glessner

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for my dogs for many years. My dogs have always eaten a raw food diet. They eat their food along with diatomaceous earth, total biotics and prozyme mixed in. My one little rescue dog had very bad tapeworms when I first got her. The diatomaceous earth, along with activz silver and the above products got things under control in about two months. She is now going on 3 and she is very healthy. My other little guy is going on 7 and very healthy. They have used total biotics all their lives! Before that I gave to my miniature schnauzers and they lived a long good life.
customer_reviews.author: capnkente

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a breeder who has been using it for his dogs, we have tried it for a couple of weeks and it seems to be doing the job. Am hoping it will help my older dog lose some weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This keeps your dogs immune system strong. High quality, human grade product! Everyone should use for their pet daily. Just like people they need probiotics too.

customer_reviews.title: Libby needed help
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews that were already written and my Libby needed something that worked. She had been suffering for about 1 1/2 years with an upset stomach. Vomiting if she didn't eat within a 12 hour time schedule and sometimes my work schedule did not allow that. Since she started using it about 3 months now she has only been sick once. I'm sold on it .

customer_reviews.title: I'm on my second container and the gas is still a thing of the past and if there's such a thing as perfect poop he has it
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a dog with more digestive problems. Sparky constantly had gas and loose stool. Most products would work at first and then stop. I'm on my second container and the gas is still a thing of the past and if there's such a thing as perfect poop he has it!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This mixes in the food so easy. I do rescue work and from time to time have kitties with tummy issues so I never let myself run out of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah C. Beno

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog with chronic kidney disease and have found that this product is very easy to give and has helped him manage his medications with very little change in his digestion. He does not object to having it included in his feedings and since he is so limited in his intake of specific foods, it allows me to regulate his diet and keep his stools normal. He is lactose intolerant and this product has been a godsend. He has been on it for 3 years now without problems.

customer_reviews.text: Great product! Really helped my dog with allergies and digestive issues as a puppy. Great value as well. We sprinkle it over his kibble and he gobbles it up. No ill-effects after >3months of use.

Husky mix has a sensitive digestive system, and periodontal disease. His first bm on a walk is usually normal, but then he'll have progressively looser stools after. It's a large container so we've been using it now for two months and there is still quite a bit left. It is very easy to add to his food and he does not seem to notice that it's there.

product_meta.title: Total-Biotics Probiotic powder for Dogs and Cats. With pre-biotics. Dog Probiotics, Cat Probiotics. Immune Support.
product_meta.description: Size:8 ouncesTotal-Biotics is specially formulated with an astounding 14 species of stabilized probiotics instead of the usual 1 - 6 forms provided in most other products It also contains over one billion CFUs (colony forming units) in each scoop for maximum support of the Microbiome Not all probiotics are alike Many cheap probiotics are unstable and lose their beneficial properties in the stomach before the probiotics can reach the intestine Some companies put probiotics in their product that do not implant We are the experts in this field The formulator of this product wrote the book The Wonder of Probiotics The formulators of Total-Biotics have over 50 years of combined knowledge We have been helping pets for since 2003 Be careful of new companies that pop up and do not know pets or probiotics We also have the NASC Quality Seal on all our pet products We only use the best ingredients all are AAFCO approved ingredients for safe use by dogs and cats
feature_bullets: The most complete probiotics for your dog and cat with 14 of the most productive live and stabilized probiotics available. We have been helping pets since 2003.
Thoughtfully designed formulas to get your pet back in the swing of things. Healthy pets are happy pets.
Total-Biotics Supports: Good Digestion, A Strong Immune System, A Healthy Digestive Tract, Normal Bowel Movements

Also, Total-Biotics supports: A Healthy Bacterial Growth in Gut, Normal Bacterial Gut Balance, Normal Gas, Manufacturing of B Vitamins, Normal Candida Yeast Probiotic Balance, Normal Food Tolerances and Optimal Health.
The only probiotic formula that uses a patented stabilized glutamine in the world MGG chelate. And a delivery system to ensure the best delivery of the probiotics. That is why this formula works.
1 jar is 228 grams and will serve (approximately) 365 cups of pet food. Made in the USA in a GMP certified factory with human quality ingredients. No worries if the kids get into it.
